creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: horizontally oriented rectangular form resembling a wave; wider, wedge like base at LLQ, and small, flared point URC; vertical fluting on front side; mounts onto rectangular piece of wood with three raised triangular rests; mounting hardware included
medium: Porcelain with pale bluish glaze (seihakuji); wood
title: View of Distant Hope: 'Streaks'
